rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Players that have three bunnies in The Bunny Circle of the same color or kinds may play two cards per turn.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Players that have three bunnies in The Bunny Circle of the same color or kinds may play two cards per turn.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Players that have three bunnies in The Bunny Circle of the same color or kinds may play two cards per turn.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Players that have three bunnies in The Bunny Circle of the same color or kinds may play two cards per turn.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: No Safety Hazards may be used on this bunny.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be used once by a player to choose a Carrot from Kaballa's Market. When all the carrots are taken from Kaballa's Market the game is over and The Magic Carrot is revealed.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be used once by a player to choose a Carrot from Kaballa's Market. When all the carrots are taken from Kaballa's Market the game is over and The Magic Carrot is revealed.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be used once by a player to choose 2 Carrots from Kaballa's Market. When all the carrots are taken from Kaballa's Market the game is over and The Magic Carrot is revealed.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be placed on any bunny which must feed the amounts shown by the end of its next turn or die.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be placed on any bunny which must feed the amounts shown by the end of its next turn or die.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be placed on any bunny which must feed the amounts shown by the end of its next turn or die.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be placed on any bunny which must feed the amounts shown by the end of its next turn or die.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: If any of the dice rolled match the Safety Hazard number, then your bunny is safe and the hazard is discarded. If none of the numbers match, then your bunny is discarded.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: If any of the dice rolled match the Safety Hazard number, then your bunny is safe and the hazard is discarded. If none of the numbers match, then your bunny is discarded.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: If any of the dice rolled match the Safety Hazard number, then your bunny is safe and the hazard is discarded. If none of the numbers match, then your bunny is discarded.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: If any of the dice rolled match the Safety Hazard number, then your bunny is safe and the hazard is discarded. If none of the numbers match, then your bunny is discarded.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: You may Buy Back any card from the discard pile for 5 Bunny Bucks and use it right now.

rules.title: Additional Rules
rules.text: Buy Back may only play Kinder Bunnies cards from the discard pile

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Trade any one Carrot of yours for two Carrots from another player.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: All Players roll one of the dice. Any player that rolled a 9 skips their next turn.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be used once to force any player to immediately lose all of his Water Units.

rules.title: Additional Rules
rules.text: The player also loses any Water Vouchers that he may have been saving.

rules.title: Noah's Flood
rules.text: Noah's Flood can be used to counteract Drought.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Roll each of the dice up to three times. Keep all of the 5's. If three 5's are rolled, then take a bunny from the discard pile.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Play this card on any bunny. All players roll one of the dice. Whoever rolled the highest number gets to keep the bunny.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Pick any number from 1 to 10 and roll the dice. Take one bunny from the discard pile for each roll that matches the number that you picked.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Roll the dice. Subtract the smallest number from the largest number and take that many Bunny Bucks from the discard pile.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be used once to force any player to immediately lose all of his Cabbage Units.

rules.title: Additional Rules
rules.text: The player also loses any Cabbage Vouchers that he may have been saving.

rules.title: Bug Off!
rules.text: Bug Off! can be used to counteract Maggots.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: All players roll a die and keep rolling as fast as they can until somebody rolls a 1. Everybody gives the winner One Bunny Buck.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: All players must give any one card from their hand to the player on their left.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Roll the dice. If three or more Prime Numbers (shown on the clock) are rolled, then take a Carrot from any player.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Give this card to any player who must return a Carrot.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Give this card to any player who must return a Carrot.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: You may see any other player's hand and take any one card that you like. You must also give one card back from your hand.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Roll the Orange die. The code tells you which carrot you may take (from the pile or from any player).

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: All players spin one of the dice (like a top). The player whose die spins the longest may take a Carrot.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: All players roll one die. Any players that roll the same number must leave all their cards and switch seats.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be used once by a player to take a Cabbage Card from Kaballa's Market.

rules.title: Additional Rules
rules.text: Cabbage may not be used if Kaballa's Market is closed.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: This card may be used to Feed The Bunny either Cabbage or Water.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: This card may be used to Feed The Bunny either Cabbage or Water.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be used once by a player to take a Water Card from Kaballa's Market.

rules.title: Additional Rules
rules.text: Water may not be used if Kaballa's Market is closed.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: This card may be used once at any time to re-roll any one of the dice.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: This card may be used once at any time to stop any Safety Hazard.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: This card may be used once at any time to stop any Bad News card.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: Aliens take all of your bunnies to the discard pile.

rules.title: Hitchbunny's Guide
rules.text: Hitchbunny's Guide can be used to retrieve this card from the discard pile because it contains a picture of the planet Jupiter.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: A Bad News Bear scares one of your bunnies into the discard pile.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: One of your bunnies eats too much candy and goes to the discard pile.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: A tornado hits! You must return all but one Carrot and discard all but one bunny.
